sentence: South  Korea  registered  a  trade  deficit  of  $  101  million  in  October  ,  reflecting  the  country  's  economic  sluggishness  ,  according  to  government  figures  released  Wednesday  .

sentence: Preliminary  tallies  by  the  Trade  and  Industry  Ministry  showed  another  trade  deficit  in  October  ,  the  fifth  monthly  setback  this  year  ,  casting  a  cloud  on  South  Korea  's  export  -  oriented  economy  .

sentence: Exports  in  October  stood  at  $  5.29  billion  ,  a  mere  0.7  %  increase  from  a  year  earlier  ,  while  imports  increased  sharply  to  $  5.39  billion  ,  up  20  %  from  last  October  .

sentence: South  Korea  's  economic  boom  ,  which  began  in  1986  ,  stopped  this  year  because  of  prolonged  labor  disputes  ,  trade  conflicts  and  sluggish  exports  .

sentence: Government  officials  said  exports  at  the  end  of  the  year  would  remain  under  a  government  target  of  $  68  billion  .
